house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1998 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential Preferred Propertie Prudential Preferred Propertie
